title: Civil Engineer Job at Pennek Nigeria Limited
content:
Pennek Nigeria Limited is a real estate investment firm specializing in the procurement and offering of choice plots of land in rapidly-developing cities with high ROI potential. We aim to make land ownership accessible, and have established strong operational relationships with banking partners to provide financing facilities. Operating within the same economic and social environment as our clients, we understand the challenges they face and take proactive steps to remove obstacles to land ownership.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Civil Engineer

Job Location: Abuja (FCT)

Role Description
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	This is a full-time, on-site role for a Civil Engineer located in Abuja. The Civil Engineer will be responsible for designing, planning, and overseeing construction and maintenance of building structures and infrastructure. This includes managing stormwater systems and ensuring all civil engineering projects meet regulatory standards and safety regulations.


Qualifications


	Candidates should possess a Bachelor's Degree in Civil Engineering or a related field
	Professional Engineer (PE) license is an advantage
	Civil Engineering Design and Civil Engineering skills
	Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills
	Experience working as a Civil Engineer
	Proficiency in Planning and managing construction projects
	Ability to work independently and as part of a team.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their a Cover Letter and CV to: info@pennek.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

title: Human Resource Officer (HR) Job at Western Development Company Limited
content:
Western Development Company Limited (WDCL) is an independent limited liability company, established in Nigeria for over 13 years ago. WDCL is the sole representative of various overseas companies in the fields of Information Technology, Telecommunications, Mechanical Engineering and Electrical/Electronic Engineering.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Human Resource Officer (HR)
Job Location: Nigeria

Job Description
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are seeking a people-focused and detail-oriented Human Resources Officer to help manage key HR functions and foster a positive work environment.
	If you’re passionate about employee welfare, recruitment, and HR best practices, we’d love to meet you.


Responsibilities


	Assist in recruitment, onboarding, and orientation of new staff
	Maintain and update employee records and HR databases
	Support payroll preparation by providing relevant data (e.g., attendance, leaves)
	Ensure compliance with company policies and labor regulations
	Handle employee queries and provide support as needed
	Organize staff training, development programs, and performance appraisals
	Support disciplinary and grievance procedures professionally.

title: Public Relations Officer Job at Africa Plus Partners Nigeria Limited
content:
Africa Plus Partners Nigeria Limited (APPNL) is a SEC licensed asset management company focused on infrastructure fund management and on the execution of small-to-mid-sized infrastructure projects in Nigeria and sub-Saharan Africa. Since inception, we have established and managed multiple equity-based, Naira denominated infrastructure funds (AIPF 1, AIPF 2 & recently, InfraCo). With a rich and robust deals pipeline, in excess of N400bn, APPNL strives to harness resources at its disposal to unlock tremendous opportunities and leverage its structuring capabilities to maximize profitability, enhance the wealth and value of its managed funds whilst contributing towards the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs).

title: Relationship Manager, Personal Banking Job at Optimus Bank
content:
Optimus Bank is a digital-driven financial service platform built with a bold ambition of offering optimum banking experiences to millions of customers globally.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Relationship Manager, Personal Banking
Job Location: Port Harcourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are seeking a dedicated and dynamic Relationship Manager to join our Retail Banking team in Port Harcourt. 


Responsibilities
This Include:
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Identify opportunities to cross-sell and upsell banking products and services

title: Job Openings at MKH Properties Limited
content:
MKH Properties Limited is committed to providing unparalleled services that cater to the diverse needs of our esteemed clients, partners, and investors.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

1.) Customer Experience Officer

Job Location: VGC, Lekki-Ajah - Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are seeking a highly motivated and detail-oriented Customer Experience Officer to join our team in the real estate sector.
	The ideal candidate will be responsible for ensuring that our clients have a seamless and satisfactory experience throughout their real estate journey — from initial inquiry through property acquisition, after-sales services, and beyond.
	This role requires strong communication, empathy, problem-solving, and process management skills.


Key Responsibilities


	Act as the first point of contact for prospective and existing clients across all communication channels (phone, email, social media, walk-ins).
	Handle customer inquiries, complaints, and feedback professionally and promptly, escalating complex issues when necessary.
	Maintain accurate and updated client records using CRM tools.
	Liaise with internal departments (sales, legal, operations, etc.) to follow up on client requests, updates, and project timelines.
	Assist in the development and implementation of customer service policies, standards, and procedures.
	Conduct periodic client check-ins and satisfaction surveys to assess service quality and identify improvement areas.
	Educate clients on product offerings, promos, payment plans, and other relevant information.
	Track and analyze customer interactions to provide insight into customer trends and areas for improvement.
	Promote customer loyalty and retention through personalized and solution-driven service.


Requirements and Qualifications


	Bachelor's Degree in Business Administration, Marketing, Communications, or related field.
	Minimum of 1 – 2 years of experience in customer service, preferably in real estate or a related industry.
	Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
	Strong interpersonal and conflict resolution skills.
	Familiarity with CRM systems and the Microsoft Office Suite.
	Attention to detail and commitment to delivering excellent customer service.
	Proximity to Lekki – Ajah is required.


Application Closing Date: 18th June, 2025.

Method of Applicatio
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Resume and a Cover letter to: hr.mkhproperties@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

2.) Business Development Manager

Job Location: VGC, Lekki-Ajah - Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Department: Sales & Business Development

Job Summary


	The Business Development Manager will be responsible for driving sales growth, forging strategic partnerships, identifying new business opportunities, and expanding the company’s client base in the real estate sector. 
	The ideal candidate will have a deep understanding of real estate markets, excellent networking skills, and a strong track record in sales or business development.


Key Responsibilities


	Identify and pursue new business opportunities in residential and commercial real estate.
	Develop and maintain relationships with brokers, channel partners, corporate clients, investors, and developers.
	Attend industry events, exhibitions, and networking functions to promote the brand.
	Prepare business proposals, presentations, and strategic plans to support growth initiatives.
	Conduct market research to identify trends, customer needs, and competitive activity.
	Lead negotiations and close deals with potential clients and stakeholders.
	Collaborate with marketing and sales teams to develop targeted strategies for lead generation.
	Monitor sales performance, track KPIs, and report on progress to senior management.
	Stay up to date with industry developments, zoning laws, and regulatory changes.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or related field.
	3 - 7 years of experience in business development, preferably in the real estate industry.
	Proven track record of achieving sales targets and driving revenue growth.
	Excellent communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills.
	Strong analytical and problem-solving capabilities.
	Knowledge of CRM tools and MS Office Suite.
	Ability to work independently and as part of a collaborative team.
	Proximity to the location (VGS, Lekki-Ajah) is an added advantage.


What We Offer


	Competitive salary and performance-based incentives.
	Opportunities for career advancement.
	A dynamic and inclusive work culture.
	Exposure to premium real estate projects and clientele


Application Closing Date: 17th June, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Resume and a Cover letter to: hr.mkhproperties@gmail.com using "Application for Business Development Manager – Real Estate" as the subject of the mail.

 

3.) Graphic Designer

Job Location: Ajah, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Department: Brand & Communications
Reports To: Brand Manager

Job Summary


	We’re looking for a highly creative Graphics Designer to join our Brand & Communications team. 
	You will be responsible for creating compelling visual content that communicates the brand’s value, drives engagement, and supports sales and marketing efforts across all platforms.


Key Responsibilities


	Design visually appealing marketing materials including flyers, banners, social media graphics, signage, and digital ads.
	Adapt brand assets into formats for web, print, and offline distribution (e.g., roll-up banners, billboards, newsletters).
	Ensure visual consistency across all communication platforms in line with brand guidelines.
	Create brochures, FAQs, project forms, and branded documents to support marketing and sales operations.
	Develop engaging motion graphics for social media, ads, presentations, and explainer videos.
	Perform high-quality photo manipulation and enhancement to elevate property visuals.
	Collaborate with writers, marketers, video editors, and developers to create integrated campaign assets.
	Work with tight deadlines and respond quickly to design revisions and campaign needs.
	Stay up to date with design trends, tools, and real estate visual storytelling approaches.


Requirements


	HND / Bachelor’s Degree in Graphic Design, Visual Arts, or related field.
	2+ years of professional design experience (preferably in real estate, advertising, or lifestyle branding).
	Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, After Effects is a plus).
	Strong portfolio showcasing a mix of print, digital, and social media design.
	Proximity to Location(Ajah) is an added advantage.


Salary
N200,000 - N250,000 / Month.

Application Closing Date: 14th June, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hr.mkhproperties@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.
